{"id":824719683,"question_id":15,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1666039738,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"233 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/824719683/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"52.7 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number[]} nums\n * @return {number[][]}\n */\nvar threeSum = function(nums) {\n    let res = [];\n  nums = nums.sort((a, b) => a - b);\n\n  for (let i = 0; i < nums.length - 2; i++) {\n    if (i > 0 && (nums[i] === nums[i - 1])) {\n      continue;\n    }\n    let left = i + 1;\n    let right = nums.length - 1;\n    \n    while (left < right) {\n      let sum = nums[i] + nums[left] + nums[right];\n      if (sum === 0) {\n        let array = [nums[i], nums[left], nums[right]];\n        res.push(array);\n        left++;\n\n        while (nums[left] === nums[left - 1] && left < right) {\n          left += 1;\n        }\n        \n      } else if (sum < 0) {\n        left++;\n      } else {\n        right--;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  return res;\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
